src_original: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi  te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva
prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. ye 'py etarhi daśadiglokadhātuṣu  tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti
te 'bhūvann atītānāgatāḥ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām
ye ca pratyekabuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya śrāvakabodhipratyekabodhiprāptās. tat kasya hetos? tathā hy (PSP_2-3:98)
